queries.query_name: PSP With Unrestricted Access to Host Path
queries.description: PodSecurityPolicy should set 'readOnly' to true in every host path allowed

files.expected_value: 'spec.allowedHostPaths' should be defined and not null

queries.description: Containers should not run with allowPrivilegeEscalation in order to prevent them from gaining more privileges than their parent process

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{tekton-pipelines-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{tekton-pipelines}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{environment-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{environment-controller}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false

queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with wildcard RBAC permissions provide excessive rights to the Kubernetes API and should be avoided. The principle of least privilege recommends to specify only the set of needed objects and actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{environment-controller}}.rules[1].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{environment-controller}}.rules[1].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{environment-controller}}.rules[0].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{environment-controller}}.rules[0].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{environment-controller}}.rules[0].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{environment-controller}}.rules[0].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{environment-controller}}.rules[1].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{environment-controller}}.rules[1].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{environment-controller}}.rules[2].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{environment-controller}}.rules[2].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{environment-controller}}.rules[2].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{environment-controller}}.rules[2].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

queries.query_name: Volume Mount With OS Directory Write Permissions
queries.description: Containers can mount sensitive folders from the hosts, giving them potentially dangerous access to critical host configurations and binaries.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{tekton-pipelines-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{tekton-pipelines}}.volumeMounts.name={{config-logging}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{environment-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{environment-controller}}.volumeMounts.name={{config-logging}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true

queries.description: Containers should only run as non-root user. This limits the exploitability of security misconfigurations and restricts an attacker's possibilities in case of compromise

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{tekton-pipelines-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{tekton-pipelines}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{environment-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{environment-controller}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{tekton-pipelines-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{tekton-pipelines}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined
metadata.name={{environment-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{environment-controller}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined

queries.description: Memory limits should be defined for each container. This prevents potential resource exhaustion by ensuring that containers consume not more than the designated amount of memory

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{tekton-pipelines-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{tekton-pipelines}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined

queries.description: Memory requests should be defined for each container. This allows the kubelet to reserve the requested amount of system resources and prevents over-provisioning on individual nodes

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{tekton-pipelines-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{tekton-pipelines}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined

queries.description: Containers should drop 'ALL' or at least 'NET_RAW' capabilities

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{tekton-pipelines-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{tekton-pipelines}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined
metadata.name={{environment-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{environment-controller}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined

queries.description: The permission to create pods in a cluster should be restricted because it allows privilege escalation.

files.expected_value: metadata.name=environment-controller.rules.verbs should not contain a wildcard value when metadata.name=environment-controller.rules.resources contains a wildcard value
files.actual_value: metadata.name=environment-controller.rules.verbs contains a wildcard value and metadata.name=environment-controller.rules.resources contains a wildcard value

files.expected_value: metadata.name=tekton-bot.rules.verbs should not contain the value 'create' when metadata.name=tekton-bot.rules.resources contains the value 'pods'
files.actual_value: metadata.name=tekton-bot.rules.verbs contains the value 'create' and metadata.name=tekton-bot.rules.resources contains the value 'pods'

files.expected_value: metadata.name=tekton-pipelines.rules.verbs should not contain the value 'create' when metadata.name=tekton-pipelines.rules.resources contains the value 'pods'
files.actual_value: metadata.name=tekton-pipelines.rules.verbs contains the value 'create' and metadata.name=tekton-pipelines.rules.resources contains the value 'pods'

queries.description: Roles or ClusterRoles with RBAC permissions to run commands in containers via 'kubectl exec' could be abused by attackers to execute malicious code in case of compromise. To prevent this, the 'pods/exec' verb should not be used in production environments

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{tekton-bot}}.rules[2].resources should not include the 'pods/exec' resource

queries.query_name: RBAC Roles with Read Secrets Permissions
queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with get/watch/list RBAC permissions on Kubernetes secrets are dangerous and should be avoided. In case of compromise, attackers could abuse these roles to access sensitive data, such as passwords, tokens and keys

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{tekton-bot}}.rules[0] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{tekton-bot}}.rules[0] is granted read access (verbs: list, get, watch) to Secrets objects

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{tekton-pipelines}}.rules[0] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{tekton-pipelines}}.rules[0] is granted read access (verbs: get, list, create, update, delete, patch, watch) to Secrets objects

queries.description: Check if Readiness Probe is not configured.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{tekton-pipelines-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{tekton-pipelines}}.readinessProbe should be defined
metadata.name={{environment-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{environment-controller}}.readinessProbe should be defined

queries.description: Containers must not be allowed to run with root privileges, which means the attributes 'privileged','allowPrivilegeEscalation' and 'readOnlyRootFilesystem' must be set to false, 'runAsUser.rule' must be set to 'MustRunAsNonRoot', and adding the root group must be forbidden

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{tekton-pipelines}}.spec.runAsUser.rule is equal to 'MustRunAsNonRoot'

queries.description: Containers should be configured with a secure Seccomp profile to restrict potentially dangerous syscalls

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{environment-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{environment-controller}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined
metadata.name={{tekton-pipelines-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{tekton-pipelines}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined

queries.query_name: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled
queries.description: Service Account Tokens are automatically mounted even if not necessary

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{environment-controller}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
metadata.name={{tekton-pipelines-controller}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false

queries.description: Service has an external load balancer, which may cause accessibility from other networks and the Internet

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{environment-controller}} using an external Load Balancer provider by cloud provider
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{environment-controller}} is exposing a workload, not using an external Load Balancer provider by cloud provider

queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles when binded, should not use get, list or watch as verbs

files.expected_value: The metadata.name={{tekton-bot}}.rules.verbs should not contain the following verbs: [["list", "get", "watch"]]
files.actual_value: The metadata.name={{tekton-bot}}.rules.verbs contain the following verbs: [["list", "get", "watch"]]

files.expected_value: The metadata.name={{tekton-pipelines}}.rules.verbs should not contain the following verbs: [["get", "list", "create", "update", "delete", "patch", "watch"]]

queries.description: Namespaces like 'default', 'kube-system' or 'kube-public' should not be used

files.expected_value: metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null

queries.description: CPU limits should be set because if the system has CPU time free, a container is guaranteed to be allocated as much CPU as it requests

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=tekton-pipelines has resources defined

queries.description: CPU requests should be set to ensure the sum of the resource requests of the scheduled Containers is less than the capacity of the node

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=tekton-pipelines should have resources defined

queries.query_name: Image Pull Policy Of The Container Is Not Set To Always
queries.description: Image Pull Policy of the container must be defined and set to Always

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{tekton-pipelines-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{tekton-pipelines}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{tekton-pipelines-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{tekton-pipelines}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{environment-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{environment-controller}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{environment-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{environment-controller}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{tekton-pipelines-controller}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{tekton-pipelines}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{tekton-pipelines-controller}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{tekton-pipelines}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{environment-controller}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{environment-controller}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{environment-controller}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{environment-controller}}

queries.description: Sees if Kubernetes Drop Capabilities exists to ensure containers security context

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{environment-controller}}.spec.containers.name=environment-controller.securityContext should be set
metadata.name={{tekton-pipelines-controller}}.spec.containers.name=tekton-pipelines.securityContext should be set

queries.query_name: Object Is Using A Deprecated API Version
queries.description: Kubernetes APIs evolve over time and are sometimes removed with newer releases. To prevent incompatibilities when upgrading Kubernetes, deprecated APIs should be replaced with newer and more stable API versions.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{environment-controller}}.apiVersion of Deployment should be {{apps/v1}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{environment-controller}}.apiVersion of Deployment  is deprecated and is {{extensions/v1beta1}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{tekton-pipelines-controller}}.apiVersion of Deployment should be {{apps/v1}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{tekton-pipelines-controller}}.apiVersion of Deployment  is deprecated and is {{apps/v1beta1}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{tekton-pipelines-default}}.apiVersion of RoleBinding should be {{rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{tekton-pipelines-default}}.apiVersion of RoleBinding  is deprecated and is {{rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1beta1}}

queries.description: Each namespace should have a LimitRange policy associated to ensure that resource allocations of Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims do not exceed the defined boundaries

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{environment-controller}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{environment-controller}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{tekton-pipelines-controller}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{tekton-pipelines-controller}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

queries.description: Each namespace should have a ResourceQuota policy associated to limit the total amount of resources Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims can consume

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{environment-controller}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{environment-controller}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{tekton-pipelines-controller}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{tekton-pipelines-controller}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

queries.query_name: Pod or Container Without Security Context
queries.description: A security context defines privilege and access control settings for a Pod or Container

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=environment-controller has a security context
files.actual_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=environment-controller does not have a security context

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=tekton-pipelines has a security context
files.actual_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=tekton-pipelines does not have a security context

queries.description: Check if the root container filesystem is not being mounted read-only.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{environment-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{environment-controller}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem should be set to true
metadata.name={{tekton-pipelines-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{tekton-pipelines}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem should be set to true

queries.description: Service should Target a Pod

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{tekton-pipelines-controller}}.spec.selector label refers to a Pod label
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{tekton-pipelines-controller}}.spec.selector label does not match with any Pod label

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{environment-controller}}.spec.selector label refers to a Pod label
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{environment-controller}}.spec.selector label does not match with any Pod label
